name: Alex Johnson
title: Azure DevOps Engineer
summary: Highly skilled Azure DevOps Engineer with 7+ years of experience in designing, implementing, and managing CI/CD pipelines, cloud infrastructure, and automation solutions on Microsoft Azure. Proficient in scripting, containerization, and monitoring.

projects.name: Automated Azure Infrastructure Deployment
projects.description: Designed and implemented end-to-end automated deployment of Azure infrastructure using Terraform and Azure DevOps Pipelines, reducing deployment time by 60%.

projects.name: Containerized Microservices Platform
projects.description: Migrated monolithic applications to a microservices architecture, containerizing them with Docker and orchestrating on Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS).

projects.name: CI/CD Pipeline Optimization
projects.description: Optimized existing Azure DevOps CI/CD pipelines for faster build and release cycles, integrating automated testing and security scanning tools.

projects.name: Hybrid Cloud Connectivity Solution
projects.description: Implemented secure and reliable hybrid cloud connectivity between on-premises data centers and Azure using ExpressRoute and VPN Gateways.
